original_text: But I have something to say against you. You let that woman Jezebel teach you. She says that she is a prophet from God. But she leads my servants into bad ways. She teaches them to have sex with many people. And she teaches them to eat food that people have given to idols.
korean_text: 그러나 네게 책망할 일이 있노라 자칭 선지자라 하는 여자 이세벨을 네가 용납함이니 그가 내 종들을 가르쳐 꾀어 행음하게 하고 우상의 제물을 먹게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: But I have something to say against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 너를 책망할 것이 있다.

sentences.original_text: You let that woman Jezebel teach you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 여자 이세벌에게 가르침을 받게 한다.

sentences.original_text: She says that she is a prophet from God.
But she leads my servants into bad ways.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀는 내 종들을 악한 길로 인도한다.

sentences.original_text: She teaches them to have sex with many people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그들에게 많은 사람들과 성관계를 갖도록 가르친다.

sentences.original_text: And she teaches them to eat food that people have given to idols.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 그들에게 우상에게 바쳐진 음식을 먹도록 가르친다.
